    • iThOcurrance

      public int iThOcurrance(String mainString, String queryString, int indexController, int howManyTimesOccured, int i)
      Finds i'th occurrance of given string in main string
      Parameters:
      mainString - main string,searched by function
      queryString - searched in the main string
      howManyTimesOccured - counts number of ocurrance of queryString in mainString,initial value = 0
      indexController - .
      i - target value of ocurrance of queryString in mainString
      Returns:
      number of ocurrance of queryString in mainString

    • findInterval

      public void findInterval(ArrayList<Integer> arr, int leftBound, int rightBound, int leftIndex, int rightIndex) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Gets two numbers and prints indexes of given array within the given bounds and prints indexes of interval's border indexes
      Parameters:
      arr - sorted array to be searched
      leftBound - small number,left border of the interval
      rightBound - big number,right border of the interval
      leftIndex - index of left border,initial value = 0
      rightIndex - index of left border,initial value = biggest possible value of index for arr
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException

    • findSum

      public void findSum(ArrayList<Integer> arr, int sum, int firstIndex, int secondIndex)
      Searches array and prints pairs of numbers that is equal to given sum
      Parameters:
      arr - array that is searched
      sum - asked sum value
      firstIndex - used to search array,initial value = 0
      secondIndex - used to search array,initial value = 0
